img_above_text:
# Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler
Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
The Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler can be used to craft the Kang-JIn Staff") from the Shrine.

To obtain the Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler, you need to defeat Kang-Jin Loong in Snowhill Path in Mirrormere in The New West.
img_below_text: For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game.

img_summary: The image depicts a dramatic scene from the game Black Myth: Wukong, showcasing a confrontation between the protagonist and a formidable dragon-like creature in a snowy, mountainous landscape. This encounter is crucial for obtaining the Starlit Cloud-Bidden Antler, a unique material used for crafting powerful gear, including the Kang-Jin Staff. The image visually represents the challenge players face in defeating Kang-Jin Loong in Snowhill Path, Mirrormere, to acquire this valuable item. For more detailed guides on item locations in the game, players are encouraged to explore additional resources.
